text: Jennifer Coolidge (born August 28, 1963 in Boston, Massachusetts) is an American movie and television actress and comedian. She acted in American Pie in 1999 and Legally Blonde in 2001. She has a recurring role in the 2011 television series 2 Broke Girls. She also acted in many other movies and television programs. ==Other websites== * * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Boston
title: Jennifer Coolidge
